p:
Estimation of total polyphenol content. Quantitative estimation of the total phenolic compounds was done in triplicate by using the Folin-Ciocalteu (Merck, India) method of Singleton et al.
26 with slight modifications. In brief, 1500 µl of diluted FC reagent was mixed with 300 µL of leaf extract thoroughly. Next, 1200 µl 7.5% Na 2CO 3 was added to it, vortexed and the total reaction mixture (3 mL) was incubated at dark for 2 h. The absorbance was measured at 765 nm. Gallic acid (SD Fine-Chem, India) was used as standard. The total phenolics contents were expressed in mg gallic acid equivalent/g dry weight.
